verbs.description: President Trump [V: has] nominated Gordon Sondland , a Portland hotel magnate and a major donor to the president , to be ambassador to the European Union .
[ARG0: President Trump] has [V: nominated] [ARG1: Gordon Sondland , a Portland hotel magnate and a major donor to the president ,] [ARG2: to be ambassador to the European Union] .
President Trump has nominated [ARG1: Gordon Sondland , a Portland hotel magnate and a major donor to the president ,] to [V: be] [ARG2: ambassador to the European Union] .
